channel.title: Base on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Base on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: New and planned
item.description: New and planned Version 2.22.0.0 25.07.2024 New features: Added new internal event for Report Layout Plus and Addressee Control integration. Version 2.21.0.0 05.07.2024 New features: Added new event for integration of new Easy Batch version. Version 2.20.0.7 10.06.2024 Error corrections: All license related calls are repeated up to three times. Version 2.20.0.6 19.04.2024 Error corrections: License check is repeated up to three times in the event of an error. Version 2.

item.title: First Steps
item.description: First steps with the Connector 365 Base App Here you will find all help and learning resources about the test version, installation and purchase of the Connector 365 Base App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.
